caption.center: JANE LIU, Petitioner/Petitioner-Appellant v. STATE OF HAWAI'I,

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CIV. NO. 1SD06-1-2)
opinion.attorneys: Jane Liu, petitioner/petitioner-appellant pro se, on the application.

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: DUFFY, J., for the court[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Levinson, Nakayama, Acoba, and Duffy, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Petitioner/Petitioner-Appellant Jane Liu's application for a writ of certiorari, filed on August 18, 2008, is hereby rejected.Page 1
